fields.name: Confirmation_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Record_Type_Name} Request

fields.name: Confirmation_Display
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation


If any of the information below is incorrect, use the “Previous” button below to navigate to the appropriate section and update the incorrect information.


Permit Details

Application Type: {!Record_Type_Name}

fields.name: Meeting_Date_Time
fields.fieldText: Meeting Date & Time

fields.name: Confirmation_Display_Estimated_Fees
fields.fieldText: Estimated Fees

fields.name: No_Fee_Applicable
fields.fieldText: There is no fee charged for Pre-Application Meeting Submittal.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Record_Type_Name} Request

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Ordinance_Policy_Effective_Date
fields.fieldText: Ordinance/Policy Effective Date

fields.name: Purpose_of_Pre_Application
fields.fieldText: Purpose of Pre-Application

fields.name: Describe_other
fields.fieldText: Describe other

fields.name: Project_Name
fields.fieldText: Project Name

validationRule.errorMessage: Field cannot exceed 50 characters

fields.name: Are_you_seeking_to_modify_a_previously_approved_project
fields.fieldText: Are you seeking to modify a previously approved project?

fields.name: Proposed_type_of_development
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed type of development? Is it a change of use from what exists currently?

fields.name: Is_this_project_located_within_the_Primary_Fire_District
fields.fieldText: Is this project located within the primary fire district?

fields.name: Are_you_proposing_a_Rezoning_or_a_New_Conditional_Zoning
fields.fieldText: Are you proposing a rezoning or a new conditional zoning?

fields.name: Are_you_seeking_an_Annexation_into_the_Town_of_Clayton
fields.fieldText: Are you seeking an annexation into the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Are_you_seeking_a_Variance
fields.fieldText: Are you seeking a variance?

fields.name: Are_you_located_within_a_floodplain
fields.fieldText: Are you located within a floodplain?

fields.name: water_shed_verbiage
fields.fieldText: For more information regarding the North Carolina Water Supply Watersheds visit: Water Supply Watersheds - DEQ

fields.name: Are_you_located_within_a_water_supply_watershed
fields.fieldText: Are you located within a water supply watershed?

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_area_of_land_disturbance_acres
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed area of land disturbance (acres)?

fields.name: Are_you_planning_to_subdivide_a_tract_of_land
fields.fieldText: Are you planning to subdivide a tract of land?

fields.name: Are_you_planning_to_extend_Public_Infrastructure_Streets_Water_Sewer_Storm_Drain
fields.fieldText: Are you planning to extend public infrastructure (streets, water, sewer, storm drain)?

fields.name: Is_this_new_construction_or_modification_of_an_existing_structure
fields.fieldText: Is this new construction, or modification of an existing structure?

fields.name: Describe_the_existing_structure
fields.fieldText: Describe the existing structure

fields.name: Describe_both_the_existing_and_proposed_square_footage
fields.fieldText: Describe both the existing and proposed square footage.

fields.name: Do_you_plan_to_create_impervious_surfaces_i_e_additional_parking_lot_or_pavement
fields.fieldText: Do you plan to create impervious surfaces? (i.e. additional parking lot or pavement)

fields.name: Do_you_propose_to_have_new_landscaping_signage_or_lighting_on_the_property
fields.fieldText: Do you propose to have new landscaping, signage, or lighting on the property?

fields.name: What_is_your_timeline_for_construction
fields.fieldText: What is your timeline for construction?

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_specific_questions_for_staff_to_be_answered_during_the_pre_appli
fields.fieldText: Do you have any specific questions for staff to be answered during the pre-application meeting?

fields.name: Include_a_description_of_your_questions
fields.fieldText: Include a description of your questions:

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText: If no meeting dates are available above, please contact Town Staff at Planning-EngineeringSubmittals@townofclaytonnc.org. Or by phone at (919) 553-5002
